pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services

Interface CalculatorStatService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CalculatorStatServiceImpl

    public interface CalculatorStatService
    Interface for managing statistics of the calculators.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long[] getGeneralStatisticsResultSet()
      Returns the result set of the general statistic of all calculators
      String[] getSelectedCalculatorGeneralStatistics(String calculatorName)
      Returns the result set of the general statistic for given calculator name
      List<Object[]> getSelectedCalculatorMonthlyData(String calculatorName, String startDate, String endDate, int monthLength)
      Returns the monthly statistics for the given calculator name and date range.
      List<Object[]> getTopXCalculatorStatsForGivenDateRange(String startDate, String endDate, long resultRange, Locale locale)
      Returns the specified number of date and the number of calculator usage for given date range.
      void saveCalculatorStat(String calcName)
      Saves the caculatorStat with given name

    • Method Detail

      • saveCalculatorStat

        void saveCalculatorStat(String calcName)
                 throws ParseException
        Saves the caculatorStat with given name
        Parameters:
        calcName - The String containing the name of the calculator
        Throws:
        ParseException - A ParseException is thrown when the given String is not able to be parsed to the Date.

      • getTopXCalculatorStatsForGivenDateRange

        List<Object[]> getTopXCalculatorStatsForGivenDateRange(String startDate,
                                                       String endDate,
                                                       long resultRange,
                                                       Locale locale)
        Returns the specified number of date and the number of calculator usage for given date range.
        Parameters:
        startDate - The String containing the first day of the range
        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        resultRange - The long containing the number of returning results
        locale - The Locale containing the user`s locale
        Returns:
        A List<Object[]> representing the date and the number of calculator usage

      • getGeneralStatisticsResultSet

        long[] getGeneralStatisticsResultSet()
        Returns the result set of the general statistic of all calculators
        Returns:
        A long[] representing the result set of the general statistic of all calculators

      • getSelectedCalculatorGeneralStatistics

        String[] getSelectedCalculatorGeneralStatistics(String calculatorName)
        Returns the result set of the general statistic for given calculator name
        Parameters:
        calculatorName - The String containing the name of the calculator
        Returns:
        A String[] representing the result set of the general statistic for given calculator name

      • getSelectedCalculatorMonthlyData

        List<Object[]> getSelectedCalculatorMonthlyData(String calculatorName,
                                                String startDate,
                                                String endDate,
                                                int monthLength)
        Returns the monthly statistics for the given calculator name and date range.
        Parameters:
        calculatorName - The String containing the name of the calculator
        startDate - The String containing the first day of the range
        endDate - The String containing the last day of the range
        monthLength - The int containing the length of the month
        Returns:
        A List<Object[]> representing the monthly statistic data
